text: tanakave cettatum, irattamum, panriyin mamicamum, allah allata peyar collappattatum akiyavaikalaittan unkal mitu haramaka akkirukkiran;. Anal evarenum pavam ceyyata nilaiyil - varampu miramal (ivarrai unna) nirpantikkappattal avar mitu kurramillai. Niccayamaka allah karunaimikkonum, mannippavanumaka irukkinran
